ygData.subject: Re: A couple questions..
ygData.msgSnippet: (ooc: Itan I hope you get this.  I dearly love flaming you erudites, hehe) Izin, put down your play things and pay attention: you re about to receive
ygData.messageBody:
(ooc: Itan I hope you get this. I dearly love flaming you erudites,
hehe)
Izin, put down your play things and pay attention: you're about to
receive instruction from the fount of all knowledge.
*sigh* Once again I, Zardoz the Great High Elven Mage, shall instruct
those barbarians who call themselves Erudites. You poor vacant skulled,
dabbler, it's simple. Bribe someone to bind you to where you wish to
return. In the great and marvelous city/fortress of Felwithe there are
lots of clerics and mages quite willing to take pity on one such as you
and will bind you. Offering a few pp would probably help your cause a
lot also. So, wherever it is you wish to return to, upon your demise,
have a more astute worker of the arcane arts perform this binding for
you.
(OOC: most higher level clerics or mages will do it for free if you ask
nice. at least I would.)
Concerning staffs: All who are wise in the way of the world know this,
my slow witted one, that staves and two handed staves do much more
damage than daggers. ( OOC: a one handed staff has the potential for
more damage than the timing penalty increase you incur for using it;
more bash for just a little more time. however never neglect to pickup
that handy spell: summon dagger. hehe it insures you'll always have a
weapon if you need one.)
If any of you vastly uninformed erudites out there have more questions
that need answering, I will gladly help enlighten you. After all is it
not the responsibility of the older, more astute races to guide, even
tolerate, the babbling of the youner, definitely more dim witted races,
like Erudites and Humans???

From: Zardoz, the great and magnificent High Elven Mage, supreme weilder
of the Arcane Arts

----Original Message Follows----
From: Ratsmak106@...
Reply-To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com
Subject: [Bristlebane_EQ] A couple questions..
Date: Mon, 5 Apr 1999 11:06:42 EDT

From: Ratsmak106@...

Hello everyone. I play a level 4 mage (seemingly the only class on this
mailing list) and I have a few questions about spells and such. Sorry
for the
list, but it's the easiest way to get it across.
1. Since you can only use Bind Affinity at level 12, are you basically
stuck
in your home town until then? I find this hard to believe, since
warriors
might not be able to cast it, but some people have said this to be true.
2. I started training in piercing, and lately I've seen most fellow
Erudites
carrying staffs or clubs. Was this a mistake? Does it even matter latter
on,
as you'll be fighting in a group and not using melee weapons?
3. Hey, where's the music?!

That's all. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

Izin
